channel.title: RABBITS
channel.itunes:summary: When Carly Parker’s friend Yumiko goes missing under very mysterious circumstances, Carly’s search for her friend leads her headfirst into a ancient mysterious game known only as Rabbits. Soon Carly begins to suspect that Rabbits is much more than just a game, and that the key to understanding Rabbits, might be the key to the survival of our species, and the Universe, as we know it.
channel.itunes:author: Public Radio Alliance
channel.description: When Carly Parker’s friend Yumiko goes missing under very mysterious circumstances, Carly’s search for her friend leads her headfirst into a ancient mysterious game known only as Rabbits. Soon Carly begins to suspect that Rabbits is much more than just a game, and that the key to understanding Rabbits, might be the key to the survival of our species, and the Universe as we know it.
channel.itunes:subtitle: When Carly Parker’s friend Yumiko goes missing under very mysterious circumstances, Carly’s search for her friend leads her headfirst into a mysterious alternate reality game known only as Rabbits: an ancient dangerous game as old as time itself.

item.title: Episode 110: The Future We Deserve
item.itunes:title: The Future We Deserve
item.description:
In the Season Finale of Rabbits, Carly encounters some old friends before leaving the country in search of Yumiko, and, perhaps, the final mystery at the heart of Rabbits.

item.title: Episode 109: Hazel
item.itunes:title: Hazel
item.description:
In the penultimate episode of Season One, Carly and Jones dig further into The mysterious Gatewick Institute, and another conversation with Alan Scarpio reveals more about the game, and the enigmatic figure known as Hazel.

item.title: Episode 101: Game On
item.itunes:title: Game On
item.description:
In the series premiere of Rabbits, Carly Parker's search for her missing best friend leads her to a mysterious nameless ancient game the players refer to only as “Rabbits;” a secret, dangerous, and occasionally fatal underground game, where the prizes are unclear but may involve: large sums of money, NSA or CSI recruitment, and perhaps even the key to unlocking the secrets of the universe.

RABBITS WEBSITE

item.title: Episode 000: Introducing Rabbits
item.itunes:title: Introducing Rabbits
item.description:
When Carly Parker’s best friend Yumiko goes missing under very mysterious circumstances, Carly’s search for her friend leads her headfirst into a mysterious game known only as Rabbits: an ancient dangerous game as old as time itself. Soon Carly begins to suspect that Rabbits is much more than just a game, and that the key to understanding Rabbits, might be the key to the survival of our species, and the Universe, as we know it.

RABBITS WEBSITE

PUBLIC RADIO ALLIANCE
